entry.translation: Congratulations, maayos na naisagawa ang installation

entry.string: Take this time to customize your installation to match your needs. Use the Modules administration to install any additional features, and use the Blocks administration to adjust the look of your sidebars.
entry.translation: Gamitin ng oras na ito para i-customize ang iyong installation para sa particular na pangangailangan. Gamitin ang Modules administration para mag-instaal ng karagdagang modules at gamitni ang Blocks administration para mabago ang hitsura ng iyong sidebars.

entry.string: You are strongly advised to remove write access to html/var/config.system.php once the install has completed. This can be done on UNIX using the command
entry.translation: Matinding ipinapayo na tanggalin ang write access sa html/var/config.system.php kapag natapos na ang installation. Pwede itong gawin sa UNIX gamit ang command na
sa loob ng html/var na directory

entry.string: If you are feeling even more security conscious you could remove read access from those who don't need it
entry.translation: Kung ikaw ay nakakaramdam ng pangangailanagn ng karagdagang seguridad, pwedeng tanggalin ang read access mula sa mga hindi kailangan nito

entry.string: (substitute "apache" for the group your webserver runs as, probably one of apache, web, www or www-data)
entry.translation: (palitan ng "apache" ang grupo kung saan ang iyong webserver ay tumatakbo, pwedeng ito ay apache, web, www, o www-data)
